Description: Tiraz fragment woven in undyed silk: decorated with a band of pseudo-inscription in green silk on a black background edged by two lines in red silk. Warp: silk, undyed, I or Z, 28/cm Weft: silk, undyed, I or Z, 14/cm Weft: silk, green, black and red, 36/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
